full_summary:
**Office Ergonomic Assessment Services**
======================================

**Requisition Information**
-------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4211053651
*   **Posting Date**: September 19, 2023
*   **Closing Date**: August 31, 2024, 14:00 EDT

**Summary**
----------

This Request for Information (RFI) is issued to gather information on eligible occupational therapists who can provide ergonomic assessment services to Canadian Federal government departments, agencies, and Crown Corporations. The government aims to strengthen its existing offering to public servants by collaborating with industries to obtain up-to-date information on current and emerging ergonomic assessment processes and standards.

**Objectives**
---------------

The Federal government is seeking qualified occupational therapists who can provide ad-hoc ergonomic assessment services across Canada. The successful providers will be contracted to provide these services in accordance with the National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) requirements.

**Request Submission Directions**
-------------------------------

All interested parties are required to submit their information through the Ariba Discovery portal. Please disregard the initial posting response deadline closing time.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Procurement Officer**: Stefano, Samuel (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: [stefano.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stefano.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490411?extsite=MTc0OTA0MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Notes**
-------------------

*   All information submitted is for the sole purpose of gathering information.
*   This RFI is part of the preparation for the National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) re-competition.  There is no purchase committed by this RFI.

**Attachments**
---------------

*   Please note that no attachments are available for download.  All necessary information can be obtained through the Ariba Discovery portal.
